full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,LHA CHEN KHYAB 'JUG CHEN PO'I DUG DBYUNG BCOS THABS 'CHI MED BDUD RTZI ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,CES LHA CHEN KHYAB 'JUG CHEN PO'I DUG DBYUNG BCOS THABS, ,'CHI MED BDUD RTZI ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RNAM DPYOD YANGS BA THO YON BLO BZANG SBYIN PA DANG, HUR TSA BI LIG THU BLO BZANG SHES RAB SOGS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BAS DO MA CHAG BAR, SU MA TI AARTHA SIDDHI MING CAN GYIS GA-YAR KHRAL @011B SBYAR BA'O, ,SA MA YA RGYA: RGYA: RGYA:)
